name: CharlotteNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Charlotte News deliveries personalized local news through your smart speaker. Update daily, Charlotte News keeps you informed on local news, traffic, weather, emergency, and the latest developing stories from your neighborhood.
This skill features content from News Break, a top-ranking app that has been delivering quality and personalized content to millions of users since 2015. The Charlotte News skill is your one-stop source for a comprehensive update about your area from credible news sources.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
